Voice-activated alarm clock: An alarm clock that responds to voice commands, allowing users to set their alarm without having to touch the clock.
Smart alarm clock: An alarm clock that connects to a network, allowing users to control it remotely through their smartphones.
Light-activated alarm clock: An alarm clock that uses light therapy to wake up users naturally.
Customizable alarm clock: An alarm clock that allows users to customize the sound, colors, and other features to their liking.
